plays.text: Penalty to Jason Doig 2 minutes for Roughing Ville Nieminen
Penalty to Ville Nieminen 2 minutes for Roughing Jason Doig
Penalty to Peter Bondra 2 minutes for Interference Ian Moran
Goal scored by Michal Rozsival assisted by Martin Straka and Jan Hrdina
Penalty to Marc Bergevin 2 minutes for Hooking Michael Nylander
Penalty to Andreas Salomonsson 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Milan Kraft
Goal scored by Sergei Gonchar assisted by Kip Miller and Michael Nylander
Penalty to Jeff Halpern 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Shean Donovan 2 minutes for Holding Jaromir Jagr
Penalty to Peter Bondra 2 minutes for Tripping Michal Rozsival
Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Holding Brendan Witt
Goal scored by Kip Miller assisted by Michael Nylander and Jaromir Jagr
